page.title: 07HOUSE PRICES IN BRENTWOOD
page.content: Some{18th century}houses are being pulled down and new houses and flats are being put up.On a new housing estate in{Warley}the houses vary in price from{Â£29,000}for a maisonette to {Â£87,000}for a four bedroomed detached house but the houses are rapidly increasing in price.This new estate will consist of{271}units and will take at least 3 years to complete. 10 years ago new flats were built amongst the old victorian houses.These houses were quickly put up and not as well planned as the modern estates.Most of the large victorian houses are now being used as {solicitors}offices and{doctors} surgeries or being renovated into flats.
